401.name: Broken Hearts
401.description: Heart suited cards will not score during this level

402.name: Broken Clubs
402.description: Club suited cards will not score during this level

403.name: Broken Diamonds
403.description: Diamond suited cards will not score during this level

404.name: Broken Spades
404.description: Spade suited cards will not score during this level

405.name: Broken Jokers
405.description: Jokers will not score during this level

406.name: Diminished Hold
406.description: Your hand will be reduced by 2 cards during this level

407.name: Zero Waste
407.description: You have no discards during this level

408.name: Unexpected Sacrifice
408.description: One of your special cards got sacrificed

409.name: Strategic Quartet
409.description: You can only play up to 4 cards during this level

410.name: Dynamic Tactics
410.description: The same hand cannot be played twice

411.name: Balanced Trade-off
411.description: A poker play is worth double, another half

412.name: Broken Figures
412.description: Figures (Jack, Queen and King) will not score during this level

413.name: Broken Modifiers
413.description: Modifiers will not work during this level

414.name: Last Words
414.description: Silence the most repeated card in the deck

415.name: Greedy Trap
415.description: Deduct 200 for each hand played and 100 for each discard

417.name: Spiderâ€™s Snare
417.description: Special cards have no effect on the first hand played

418.name: Perpetual Curse
418.description: Silence a random card in each hand played
